title: Thinking of You 💭
body: Just wanted to remind you that you mean the world to me. ❤️

title: You’re My Favorite Person 💑
body: No matter how busy the day gets, you're always in my heart.

title: You Make My Heart Smile 😊
body: Life’s better with you. Just saying. 💕

title: Love Ping! 📲
body: This is your daily reminder that someone loves you madly.

title: My Love Language is Notifications 😘
body: Here's a little ping to say “I miss you.”

title: Hey You, Cutie 🧸
body: I just felt like bothering you with love. Deal with it. 😋

title: Ping! Love Inside 💌
body: This message contains 100% pure affection. Open with care. 💗

title: I Did a Thing… 😇
body: I fell for you again. Oops. ❤️

title: Luv Update Available 🛠️
body: Download my hug now. It’s bug-free and super warm!

title: OTP Incoming! 📦
body: One True Pairing alert: You + Me = ❤️

title: You Stole My Heart... 🍕
body: But I’ll let you keep it if you bring pizza.

title: Are You WiFi? 📡
body: Because I’m feeling a strong connection.

title: You're the Peanut Butter to My Jelly 🥪
body: And today I’m feeling extra spreadable. 😘

title: Love Alert: Cuteness Overload 🚨
body: I love you more than I love scrolling memes. That’s big.

title: You're My Favorite Distraction 💻❤️
body: Every time I think of you, I forget what I was doing.

title: Certified Snuggle Dealer 🐻
body: Claim your free cuddles—limited time offer!

title: Heads Up: I Adore You 😍
body: No need to reply, just bask in my love.

title: 100% Romantic Energy Detected 💘
body: Brace yourself... I’m about to love-bomb you!

title: Can I Keep You Forever? 🔒
body: Just checking if the cutest human is still mine.

title: Guess Who's in Love Again? 🥹
body: Spoiler: It’s me. With you. Always.

title: Do Not Disturb—Loving You 🛑
body: All systems are busy thinking about you.

title: Warning: Romantic Vibes Incoming 💞
body: Your partner is about to smother you with love.

title: Is It Hot in Here? 🔥
body: Oh wait, it’s just you lighting up my heart.

title: You're Stuck in My Head 🎧
body: But it’s okay, I like the sound of you.

title: Love Reminder 📝
body: You're doing amazing at being my person.

title: Breaking News! 📰
body: You're still the best part of my life.

title: Emoji Can’t Express This 💯
body: But just know... I’m crazy about you.

title: Love Notification 🔔
body: No reason. Just love. And more love.

title: Random Act of Love 💕
body: I randomly chose to love you again. Surprise!

title: Spoiler Alert! 📣
body: I’m deeply, madly, and endlessly into you.

title: Your Face = My Happy Place 😍
body: I think I smiled just thinking of you.

title: My Day Needed You 🫶
body: So I sent this message. Feel hugged.

title: Pause Everything! 🛑
body: Time for a quick 'I love you' break.

title: Hug Incoming 🤗
body: It's virtual, but it's real. Promise!

title: Permission to Flirt? 😏
body: Too late. Already doing it.

title: This Just In... 🧠💓
body: You’re constantly on my mind.

title: Emergency Kiss Needed 🚨
body: Please respond with affection. Or snacks.

title: Heart Status: Taken 💘
body: By the most amazing human—yes, you.

title: You're My Plot Twist 🎬
body: And the best part of my story.

title: Love Transmission Started 📡
body: Receiving? Because I’m sending everything your way.

title: You’re Still My Favorite Notification 🔔
body: And I hope this one made you smile. 😊
